title: Backend Engineer
description:
## Senior Backend Engineer

We are looking for an experienced **Backend Engineer** to join our growing engineering team.

**Responsibilities**
- Design, implement, and maintain backend services and APIs using Node.js and Express.
- Collaborate with frontend engineers to define and integrate RESTful APIs.
- Write clean, testable, and maintainable code; perform code reviews.
- Troubleshoot and optimize performance and scalability of services.
- Participate in architecture discussions and drive technical decisions.

**Requirements**
- 4+ years professional experience building backend services in Node.js/TypeScript.
- Strong understanding of databases (MongoDB, PostgreSQL) and data modeling.
- Experience with authentication, authorization, and secure API design.
- Familiarity with testing frameworks and CI/CD pipelines.
- Solid knowledge of HTTP, REST, and web security best practices.

**What we offer:** competitive salary, flexible work environment, and growth opportunities.

title: Frontend Developer
description:
## Frontend Developer

Join our product team as a **Frontend Developer** focused on building delightful user experiences.

**Responsibilities**
- Build and maintain responsive web applications using React and TypeScript.
- Implement UI designs, component libraries and ensure cross-browser compatibility.
- Optimize performance and accessibility.
- Collaborate with designers and backend engineers to deliver features.
- Write unit and integration tests to ensure high quality.

**Requirements**
- 3+ years experience with React and TypeScript.
- Strong understanding of state management, hooks, and component patterns.
- Familiarity with build tools (Vite, Webpack) and testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library).
- Good eye for detail and UX sensibilities.

**Benefits:** Remote-friendly, flexible hours, and a training budget.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
## DevOps Engineer

We are seeking a **DevOps Engineer** to help automate and scale our infrastructure.

**Responsibilities**
- Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code (Terraform).
- Monitor, alert, and troubleshoot production systems.
- Work with engineering teams to enable reliable deployments and observability.
- Harden systems for security and compliance.

**Requirements**
- 3+ years experience with cloud platforms (AWS/Azure/GCP).
- Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Terraform, and CI tools.
- Strong Linux skills and scripting (Bash, Python).
- Familiarity with logging/monitoring stacks (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK).

**Perks:** Equipment allowance and well-being benefits.

title: QA Engineer
description:
## QA Engineer

We are seeking a detail-oriented **QA Engineer** to join our QA team and ensure product quality and reliability.

**Responsibilities**
- Develop and execute test plans.
- Automate regression tests.
- Collaborate with developers and product managers.

**Requirements**
- 2+ years experience in QA.
- Familiarity with automation tools.
- Strong analytical skills.

**Benefits:** Flexible hours, remote work.

title: Product Manager
description:
## Product Manager

We are looking for an experienced **Product Manager** to lead product development and strategy.

**Responsibilities**
- Define product vision.
- Work with cross-functional teams.
- Prioritize features and roadmap.

**Requirements**
- 4+ years experience in product management.
- Excellent communication skills.
- Experience with agile methodologies.

**Perks:** Stock options, flexible PTO.

title: Cloud Engineer
description:
## Cloud Engineer

We are seeking a skilled **Cloud Engineer** to design and manage scalable cloud infrastructure.

**Responsibilities**
- Architect cloud solutions.
- Automate deployments.
- Monitor and optimize resources.

**Requirements**
- 3+ years with AWS/Azure/GCP.
- Scripting and automation experience.
- Security best practices.

**Benefits:** Training budget, wellness programs.

title: AI Engineer
description:
## AI Engineer

Develop and deploy AI models for real-world applications.

**Responsibilities**
- Build machine learning pipelines.
- Collaborate with data scientists.
- Optimize model performance.

**Requirements**
- 2+ years in AI/ML.
- Python, TensorFlow/PyTorch.
- Data engineering skills.

**Perks:** Research budget, remote work.

title: Technical Writer
description:
## Technical Writer

Create clear and concise documentation for products.

**Responsibilities**
- Write user guides and API docs.
- Work with engineers and designers.
- Edit and proofread content.

**Requirements**
- 1+ year in technical writing.
- Excellent English skills.
- Attention to detail.

**Benefits:** Mentorship, flexible schedule.

title: Business Analyst
description:
## Business Analyst

Analyze business processes and recommend improvements.

**Responsibilities**
- Gather requirements.
- Create reports and dashboards.
- Support project management.

**Requirements**
- 2+ years in business analysis.
- Strong Excel/SQL skills.
- Communication skills.

**Perks:** Career growth, team events.

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description:
## Site Reliability Engineer

Ensure system reliability and uptime.

**Responsibilities**
- Monitor production systems.
- Automate incident response.
- Improve deployment pipelines.

**Requirements**
- 3+ years in SRE/DevOps.
- Experience with monitoring tools.
- Coding/scripting skills.

**Benefits:** On-call bonus, remote option.

title: Embedded Software Engineer
description:
## Embedded Software Engineer

Develop firmware for embedded devices.

**Responsibilities**
- Write and debug C/C++ code.
- Integrate with hardware.
- Test and validate systems.

**Requirements**
- 2+ years in embedded development.
- C/C++ proficiency.
- Electronics knowledge.

**Perks:** Lab access, hardware discounts.

title: Platform Engineer
description:
## Platform Engineer

Build and maintain scalable platform infrastructure.

**Responsibilities**
- Develop platform services.
- Ensure high availability.
- Collaborate with product teams.

**Requirements**
- 3+ years in platform engineering.
- Cloud and automation experience.
- Problem-solving skills.

**Benefits:** Stock options, flexible PTO.

title: Game Developer
description:
## Game Developer

Design and develop engaging games.

**Responsibilities**
- Implement game mechanics.
- Collaborate with artists and designers.
- Optimize performance.

**Requirements**
- 1+ year in game development.
- Unity/Unreal experience.
- Creativity and teamwork.

**Perks:** Game jams, equipment budget.

description:

- Collaborate with data teams.
- Optimize model performance.

**Requirements**

- Python, TensorFlow, scikit-learn.
- Data engineering skills.

**Perks:** Research budget, remote work.

- Coach agile teams.

**Requirements**

- Agile certification.
- Communication skills.

**Perks:** Training budget, flexible PTO.

title: Network Administrator
description:
## Network Administrator

Manage and secure network infrastructure.

**Responsibilities**
- Configure routers and switches.
- Monitor network performance.
- Troubleshoot connectivity issues.

**Requirements**
- 2+ years in network admin.
- Cisco/Juniper experience.
- Security best practices.

**Benefits:** Certification support, wellness programs.

title: Database Administrator
description:
## Database Administrator

Maintain and optimize databases.

**Responsibilities**
- Backup and restore data.
- Tune database performance.
- Ensure data security.

**Requirements**
- 3+ years in DBA role.
- SQL Server/MySQL/Postgres.
- Scripting skills.

**Perks:** Conference budget, remote work.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
## Full Stack Developer

Join our dynamic team to build scalable web applications.

**Responsibilities**
- Develop both frontend and backend features.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams.
- Write clean, maintainable code.

**Requirements**
- 3+ years experience in full stack development.
- Proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript.
- Experience with Node.js and React.

**Benefits:** Flexible work, tech conferences.

title: Data Scientist
description:
## Data Scientist

Analyze data and build predictive models.

**Responsibilities**
- Collect and process large datasets.
- Develop machine learning models.
- Communicate insights to stakeholders.

**Requirements**
- 2+ years in data science.
- Python, pandas, scikit-learn.
- Strong statistics background.

**Perks:** Research budget, remote work.

Design intuitive user interfaces.

**Responsibilities**

- Conduct user research.
- Collaborate with developers.

**Requirements**
- 2+ years in UX/UI design.
- Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD.
- Portfolio of design projects.

**Benefits:** Design workshops, remote work.

title: Mobile Developer
description:

Develop mobile applications for iOS and Android.

**Responsibilities**
- Build and maintain mobile apps.
- Work with designers and backend engineers.
- Optimize app performance.

**Requirements**
- 1+ year in mobile development.
- React Native/Flutter.
- Published apps in app stores.

**Perks:** Device budget, flexible hours.
